answers.answer: They can't really tell anything without ultrasound as far a fibroids or the baby actually measuring big. some people just assume things without knowing ing factsDon't worry about the weight I went from 125-204 in 2010 with my oldest and he was a healthy 7.3 lbs.  Unless they do a ultrasound n are co concerned don't worry to much! Goodluck momma.

I had a ultrasound at 19 weeks & 4 days and everything was great but i had drank oj that morning and he was kicking around everywhere and they couldnt get him to be still for a picture of his heart so im having another one June 23
OK then I really wouldn't worry unless they said something at the ultrasound good luck :-)

Measuring big isn't necessarily a bad thing unless they think it's from a medical issue like diabetes. My cousin started measuring big with her last pregnancy and the Dr just kept telling her baby is measuring big and she had no medical issues wrong with her she just had s big baby. Her baby came out at 9lbs 3oz. So it's possible you just have a big baby nothing wrong with that good luck
They told me with my first he was going to be under 5 lbs I was having no end of scans but when the time came he was 7'11 id take everything they say with a pinch of salt good luck x

I was told with 2 of my children that I was gaining to much weight but they both came out 5 PDS 12 ounces because I slowed down with eating I think that its an opinion and I don't plan on listening to that this time if I gain to much o well but I at least want my baby to be 6 PDS or more and not what they want my child to be
Thanks mamas i hope i dont have diabetes

question: I switched doctors because my aunt who is a obgyn works there and wanted me to switch so id get better care.Yesterday was my first appoinent there. The nurse when getting my b/p and temp asked if i switched because of diabetes (sp)?? I told her no because my aunt works here...that scared me a little right there. I was 178 pre pregnancy weight (i think) and im 197 now at 21 weeks and 4 days. The doctor check the heart beat which she said was around 150 which is good she said. Then she was measuring fundemental height with a tape measure and said hmmmm the baby is measuring big. I told her that at my last ultrasound he measured a week early (big). She asked if ive ever had fibroids...i told her not that i know of. She told me to try not to gain anymore weight which i dont think i look like ive gained that much. Should i be concerned? My husband was 9 pounds 8 oz when he was born.
title: New doctor has me worried
